body_html: Regardless of the current feature set, I think we're just going to move to the now opensourced https://github.com/abseil/abseil-py/tree/master/absl/flags at some point, so I'd rather avoid any further development of our homegrown version that would make it functionally different than that one.
body_text: Regardless of the current feature set, I think we're just going to move to the now opensourced https://github.com/abseil/abseil-py/tree/master/absl/flags at some point, so I'd rather avoid any further development of our homegrown version that would make it functionally different than that one.
body: Regardless of the current feature set, I think we're just going to move to the now opensourced https://github.com/abseil/abseil-py/tree/master/absl/flags at some point, so I'd rather avoid any further development of our homegrown version that would make it functionally different than that one.
